Hungary to sign defence industry deal with Sweden, PM Orban saysHungary will sign a defence industry deal with Sweden, Prime Minister Viktor Orban said ahead of a meeting with Swedish Prime Minister Ulf Kristersson in Budapest later on Friday, as Hungary prepares to finally ratify Sweden's NATO bid. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 07:28:10 GMT 75PPAPVOCRIRTOHTFTJSKG4EEE https://www.reuters.com/world/hungary-sign-defence-industry-deal-with-sweden-pm-orban-says-2024-02-23/Krisztina Than世界
Spain apartment building engulfed in flames, at least four deadAt least four people were killed in a fire that engulfed an apartment building in Valencia in eastern Spain, local authorities said on Friday, while at least 19 people remained missing. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 07:18:10 GMT IDX3R6G6SZI3PLDRJA2A5XQMFU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spain-apartment-building-engulfed-flames-least-four-dead-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
With spears and shields, India's Nihang Sikh warriors join farmers' protestThousands of protesting Indian farmers facing off with security forces have come under the protection of the Nihang Sikhs, a warrior sect dating back to the 1600s distinguished by their ink-blue robes and ancient weapons such as swords and spears. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 06:47:40 GMT 7D6BE667YVLKLKYRK526MO7JBU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/with-spears-shields-indias-nihang-sikh-warriors-join-farmers-protest-2024-02-23/Sunil Kataria世界印度
After fleeing war, Ukrainians face uncertain future across EuropeWhen she arrived in England almost two years ago, Mila Panchenko thought her months-long journey from the devastated Ukrainian city of Mariupol was over and she could settle down. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 06:05:21 GMT XYH356EF6ZMEFNZQLD3UKGVTUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/after-fleeing-war-ukrainians-face-uncertain-future-across-europe-2024-02-23/Elizabeth Piper世界欧洲
Fate of US aid to Ukraine package discussed on Taiwan trip, lawmakers sayA stalled U.S. bill on military aid to Ukraine which will also help fund weapons for Taiwan was discussed this week during a visit to Taipei by U.S. lawmakers, two of the participants said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:54:22 GMT NAHGJ4PVKFK4RPKXDBHAE7OVVE https://www.reuters.com/world/fate-us-aid-ukraine-package-discussed-taiwan-trip-lawmakers-say-2024-02-23/Reuters世界
Australian police officer charged with murdering 2 missing Sydney menA Sydney police officer was charged on Friday with murdering his former boyfriend and another man, who have both been missing for days, after blood was found at the boyfriend's home. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:45:28 GMT J2PUSVZZXVOLTEUPQIMDMRUXKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australian-police-officer-charged-with-murdering-2-missing-sydney-men-2024-02-23/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Israeli military says it killed West Bank militant in air strikeThe Israeli military said on Friday it had targeted a militant from the Islamic Jihad group in an air strike in the occupied West Bank who was on his way to carry out an attack. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:41:56 GMT IJAQ3EYCUVIUHGFLGEZVZOYSUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-says-it-killed-west-bank-militant-air-strike-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中东
China's "dragon" baby boom may boost population in 2024, report saysMore babies are being born in hospitals across China in the Year of the Dragon, financial news outlet Yicai reported, an increase which could soften the decline in population in 2024 and bring cheer to policymakers. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:08:46 GMT 46QRSODBDZN67CNWY2VVEKJ7IU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dragon-baby-boom-may-boost-population-2024-report-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中国
Several injured in 100-car pile-up on icy China expresswaySeveral people were injured after more than 100 cars collided into each other on an icy stretch of an expressway in the Chinese city of Suzhou, state media reported on Friday, the latest accident caused by extreme weather conditions. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 04:17:45 GMT FPDMEXD3DBLI3ASVZJN7LXUT3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/china/several-injured-100-car-pile-icy-china-expressway-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中国
Israeli defence firms make air show return, tight-lipped on Gaza warIsrael's defence industry was out in force at the Singapore Airshow this week, making its return after being largely absent from the Dubai air show in November in the wake of the Israel-Hamas war, a subject that was off limits at the Asia summit. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 04:15:44 GMT IFWVLKZO6JOPHO7GRQNKB3MK6A https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/israeli-defence-firms-make-air-show-return-tight-lipped-gaza-war-2024-02-23/Joe Brock商业航空航天与国防
New Zealand reassessing proposed overhaul of Antarctic baseNew Zealand is reassessing a proposed overhaul of its Antarctica base after negotiations with a construction firm reached a deadlock due to budget issues, the government agency responsible for the country's Antarctic operations said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 03:21:39 GMT JU5BCJOQABM5FAGHVAUYOOQE64 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zealand-reassessing-propose-overhaul-antarctic-base-2024-02-23/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
